rukus.text: Je vitalalelya tambyasarakhe ahe ani potata ukalata rahate
Tyala dhara, maga pharaphatata odhata ne'una jahannamacya madhyabhagi pohacava
Maga tyacya dokyavara garama ukalatya panyaci yatana (azaba) ota
(Tyala sangitale ja'ila) cakhata ja (godi), tu tara motha pratisthita ani adarasanmana balaganara hota
Hica ti gosta hoya, jicyababata tumhi sanka karita asata
Nihsansaya, allahace bhaya balaganare santipurna thikani asatila
Patala va mulayama resami vastre ghatalele, samorasamora basale asatila
He tyaca prakare ahe, ani amhi mothaya netrancya hura-parinsi tyanca vivaha karuna de'u
Nirbhayatapurvaka tithe pratyeka prakaracya mevyaci magani karatila
Tithe te mrtyuca svada cakhanara nahita, pahilya mrtyukherija (jo jagata ghadala) tyanna allahane jahannamacya (bhayankara) siksa - yatane (azaba) pasuna vacavile
Hi kevala tumacya palanakartyaci krpa ahe. Hica ahe mothi saphalata
Amhi ya (kura'ana) la tumacya bhaseta sope kele, yasathi ki tyanni (lokanni) bodha grahana karava
Ata tumhi pratiksa kara, he dekhila pratiksa karita aheta
